resources: My Application Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition Create New Character Class Race Please select your race or class //Character Bio Strings Character Bio Character Name Character Alignment Character Age Character Height Character Weight Character Eye Color Character Skin Color Character Hair Color //Character Bio Strings 2 Character Bio Continued Character Personality Traits Character Ideals Character Bonds Character Flaws //Class Strings Class List Barbarian Bard Cleric Druid Fighter Monk Paladin Ranger Rogue Sorcerer Wizard Warlock //Barbarian Strings Level Proficiency Bonus // Race Strings Race List Dwarf Elf Halfling Human Dragonborn Gnome Half-Elf Half-Orc Tiefling Subraces Ability Score Improvement Age Alignment Size Speed Other Traits Darkvision — You have superior vision in dark and dim light within 60ft of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray //Dwarf Strings Constitution + 2 Dwarves mature around 18 years and live roughly 350 Dwarves are typically lawful good Dwarves are roughly 4–5ft tall and weigh around 150lbs. Size Medium Dwarves move at a speed of 25ft. Speed is not reduced by heavy armor Dwarven Resilience — You have advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage Dwarven combat training — You are proficient with battleaxes, handaxes, throwing–hammers, and warhammers Dwarves are proficient with one of the following Artisan\'s tools: Smith\'s tools, Brewer\'s tools, or Mason\'s tools Stonecutting — Dwarves gain double proficiency in the history skill when the skill check is related to stonework Dwarves can speak, read, and write in both Common and Dwarvish Hill Dwarf Wisdom + 1 Dwarven Toughness — Hit point maximum increased by 1, and increases by one again each time you gain a level Mountain Dwarf Strength + 2 Dwarven armor training — You gain proficiency with light and medium armor //Dragonborn strings Strength + 2 Charisma + 1 Dragonborn mature around 15 years and live roughly 80 Dragonborn tend to extremes. Most are good but some can be terrible villains Dragonborn are typically over 6ft tall and around 250lbs. Size medium Dragonborn move at a speed of 30ft Draconic Ancestry — You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type, as shown in the table Dragon Damage Type Breath Weapon Black Acid 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex save) Blue Lightning 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex save) Brass Fire 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex save) Bronze Lightning 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex save) Copper Acid 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex save) Gold Fire 15 ft. cone (Dex save) Green Poison 15 ft. cone (Dex save) Red Fire 15 ft. cone (Dex save) Silver Cold 15 ft. cone (Dex save) White Cold 15 ft. cone (Dex save) Breath Weapon – You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation. When you use your breath weapon, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a saving throw, the type of which is determined by your draconic ancestry. The DC for this saving throw equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 2d6 damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 3d6 at 6th level, 4d6 at 11th level, and 5d6 at 16th level. After you use your breath weapon, you can’t use it again until you complete a short or long rest. Damage Resistance — You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry Dragonborn can speak, read, and write in Common and Draconic //Elf Strings Dexterity + 2 Elves mature around 18 years and live around 750 Elves tend to enjoy the lighter aspects of chaos and are often good Elves are typically between 5–6ft tall and have slender builds. Size medium Elves move at a speed of 30ft Keen Senses — You have proficiency in the Perception skill Fey Ancestry — You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can\'t put your to sleep Trance — Elves don’t need to sleep. Instead they meditate deeply remaining semiconscious for 4 hours a day. While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep Elves can speak, read, and write in Common and Elvish High Elf Intelligence + 1 Elf Weapon Training — You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow Cantrip — You know one cantrip of your choise from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice Wood Elf Wisdom + 1 Elf Weapon Training — You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow Fleet of Foot — Your base walking speed is increased to 35 Mask of the Wild — You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena Dark Elf(Drow) Charisma + 1 Superior Darkvision — Darkvision has a radius of 120ft Sunlight Sensitivity — You have disadvantage on attack rolls and wisdom(perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight Drow Magic — You know the dancing lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast faerie fire spell once per day. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once per day. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spells Drow Weapon Training — You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows // Halfling Strings
